description: About this Role: Department: Marketing, Partnerships, and Social Contract Type: full-time for at least 3 months, preferred 6 months Schedule: Hybrid schedule - 3 days/week in office @ Century City office. Compensation: $20/hr (USD)
responsibilities: Support 360 marketing strategies, and assist in digital and offline marketing initiatives from ideation, planning, execution to reporting. Identify relevant influencers and own the outreach and call scheduling process. Proactively liaise and communicate with existing influencers, track KOLs partnership timely and maintain long-term relationships. Assist in the brainstorming, creation, and proofing of marketing deliverables including video, stills, banners that resonates with the BIGO brand. Draft and develop internal and external communications, copywriting and briefs for the marketing campaigns. Perform market analysis and research on competition, identify social trends, brainstorm campaign ideas and create content calendars to promote BIGO and build strong social following. Track and analyze key metrics to identify high-performing ideas and campaigns for scalability. Create periodical reports, campaign presentations, meeting notes and other administrative tasks as needed. Acting as a strong liaison between US team and HQ and comfortable with working across different time zones.

qualifications.required: Junior/Senior year student enrolled in a college and pursuing a major in marketing, communications, business, or other relevant studies. Applied understanding of marketing knowledge and familiarity with digital channels (TikTok, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, YouTube, Google Ads etc.). Strong research and analytical skills. Well versed in the latest trends in pop culture, entertainment and social. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Self-starter with ability to work independently and cross-functionally. Efficient, multitasking and desire to work in a fast-paced, and entrepreneurial environment. Photography, video editing and graphic design skills are a plus. Full of creativity and able to think out of the box.
